replies.msg:
做body check報告寫我淋巴球偏低（range-10%)，嗜中性球偏高(range+10%)，但白血球總數正常，醫生話我抽血果日可能冇咁舒服問題不大，之後會正常番

雖然醫生咁講但係諗落都係有啲唔放心，加上我當日抽血都冇咩唔舒服，有冇師兄師姐熟呢方面或者可以分享下？

Lymphocytopenia, also referred to as lymphopenia, occurs when your lymphocyte count in your bloodstream is lower than normal. Severe or chronic low counts can indicate a possible infection or other signficant illness and should be investigated by your doctor.

Neutrophilia refers to a higher than normal number of neutrophils. Neutrophilia may result from a shift of cells from the marginal to the circulating pool (shift neutrophilia) without an increase in the total blood granulocyte pool (TBGP) or from a true increase in TBGP size (true neutrophilia).

要確實原因基本上只靠兩個檢驗項目 我諗無乜可能，不過應該係感染或發炎所引起 Neutrophilia 及 Lymphocytopenia
參考值:
Neutrophilia > 80%
Lymphocytopenia < 10%


References:
Lymphocytopenia: Causes, Symptoms, and Treatment. (n.d.). Retrieved from https://www.healthline.com/health/lymphocytopenia

Neutrophilia. (2017, January 06). Retrieved from https://emedicine.medscape.com/article/208576-overview
